# Foreword

I am [Caleb Jin](https://www.sjin.name/). After I read this paper, **[EMVS: The EM Approach to Bayesian Variable Selection](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/01621459.2013.869223)**[@EMVS], I write down the nodes of the key idea and R code to realize it.
